page.title: 15Billingham Forum
page.content: The forum is a meeting place for people in the area. The Forum Theatre with 637 seats is used for musicals, plays, ballets and films. The theatre walls and boxes are panelled with brown wood. The seats are red velvet. The seats on the two upper levels are in boxes. Shows often come to Billingham before they go to London theatres. The sport area caters for all major sports, including football, netball, badminton, gymnastics, tennis and squash. There is a multi-gym and karate club. There are two swimming pools, one is deep the other for learners. There is an ice rink, a soft play area and a sauna. Every month a free exhibition is held at the Forum.
